channel.title: Please help
channel.description:
hello, i know this is my first post, but i have a question. no before you start calling me a noob and tell me to use the search, i already know im a noob, and i have tried the search.
now for my question, how can i enable the ::commands, im using the nixscape source files i guess thats whats its called lol, and i was looking through the client.cfg and found this, is it right?, if so, how can i use it?
all thooughts, help, and insults, yes even insults are appreciated :D thanks in advance
skandoluzz
that cod i had up was annoying to scroll down, so i removed it :D

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @skandoluzz skandoluzz
item.description:
@skandoluzz wrote:

Thank you, your amazing!
but how come i do not have a gold crown?lol
holy im a pest lol, can any one tell my how to fix that?
thanks in advance
+1 rep xerozcheez

Read full topic

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

Add this where you login, change yournamehere to the admins name

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“yournamehere”)
playerRights = 3;

Also if your commands aren’t working then it’s packet type 103 (case 103 under parseincomingpackets())
So make sure it looks something like this:

		case 103:		//Custom player command, the ::words
			String playerCommand = inStream.readString();
			println_debug("playerCommand: "+playerCommand);
			customCommand(playerCommand);

Most servers will have that so I doubt that’s the problem, and if it is and that doesn’t fix you’ll need to add the customCommand method, which should start off like this:

public void customCommand(String command)
{
if(command.EqualsIgnoreCase(“yourcommandhere”))
{
tell it what to do here
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @skandoluzz skandoluzz
item.description:
@skandoluzz wrote:

everytime i add myself to be a lvl 3 admin, it still will not allow myself to spawn the items… is there something like “true” i have to say “false” or vice-versa?[br][size=1]Posted at: April 17, 2006, 03:33:07 pm[/size][hr]ya, everytime i set it to character-rights = 3
it wont let me spawn anything and sets me back to character-rights = 0
any reasons on how this can be prevented?

Thanks in advance

and just to kill 2 birds with one stone lol, how can i go into the members area?
i keep getting character-ismember = 1
do i add it to 2 or 3?[br][size=1]Posted at: April 17, 2006, 03:36:17 pm[/size][hr]actually, to make things easier, and to see what i mean, or whatever, here is a screen shot[br][size=1]Posted at: April 17, 2006, 04:00:07 pm[/size][hr]any thoughts?
